channel.title: K-State Libraries Internal Systems Status Page

item.title: E-ink Display Issue
item.description:
(15:50 — Aug 31) – All signs are currently up. We do have another follow up call with the vendor later today, and will update this once we have more information.

(15:00 — Aug 31) – The only sign at this time not updating is one of the signs for 581. We do have another follow up call with the vendor later today, and will update this once we have more information.

(13:20 — Aug 31) – We are still working with the vendor to restore the signs back to 100%. At this time, the following rooms are not displaying correct information: 103A, 103F, 103H, 103J, 103K, 109, 181 (one of the signs), 407, and 581 (one of the signs).

We are experiencing some issues with our E-ink Displays (JOAN replacements). We are working on a solution and will send out another notice, when the issue is resolved.

item.title: [Resolved] NLA Platform Upgrade (Palm)
item.description:
The upgrade to the Plam release has been completed (13:57 — Aug 15)

We will be upgrading the New Literacies Alliance Open edX instance from Olive to Palm. During this time, the system will be unavailable.

item.title: [Resolved] StaffNet Platform Upgrade
item.description:
(07:20 — Jul 28) – The upgrade has been completed.

StaffNet will be unavailable during the scheduled maintenance in order to perform necessary system updates.

item.title: [Resolved] ILLiad is Down
item.description:
Access to ILLiad has been restored

ILLiad is currently experiencing an outage, and we are working with the vendor to resolve the outage.

item.title: [Resolved] K-REx Maintenance
item.description: K-REx will be unavailable starting at 10:30AM on 05/25/2023 for system maintenance. It should be returned to service within two hours.

item.title: [Resolved] Network disruptions will occur in the evening on March 15th
item.description:
(09:02 — Mar 15) – The Start Time has Changed to 6PM this evening.

The evening of March 15th Campus IT will be performing maintenance to the campus network starting at 6:00PM. Hale Library will have brief outages during the maintenance periord while intenret traffic is routed over the different pathways on campus.

During the work, if basic functionality (Internet connectivity, routing, GlobalProtect, VPN, or building connectivity does not work, the issues will be worked on to try to find a resolution. If we run into unforeseen issues where this functionality is not performing correctly and doesn’t appear that it will be in a timely manner, we will reach a point where we roll back to the original hardware. If problems can be resolved quickly enough, we will reschedule for March 16th for the same 6:00pm to 6am March 17th.

item.title: [Resolved] StaffNet Platform Upgrade
item.description:
(12:52 — Mar 13) – The upgrade has been completed.

StaffNet will be unavailable during the scheduled maintenance in order to perform necessary system updates.

item.title: [Resolved] Ticketing System Software Upgrade
item.description:
(08:35 — Mar 2) – The upgrade has been completed.

The ticketing system will be unavailable for a few minutes to perform a system upgrade.

item.title: [Resolved] K-REx Maintenance for Sunday Evening
item.description:
(21:58 — Jan 29) – The upgrade has been completed.

K-REx will be unavailable starting at 9PM on 1/29/2023 for system maintenance and software upgrade.

item.title: [Resolved] GlobalProtect VPN
item.description:
(09:06 — Jan 27) – It should be working now. Please report back if not.

(07:30 — Jan 27) – Issues connecting to the K-State VPN via GlobalProtect have been reported and is currently being investigated.

item.title: [Resolved] K-REx Maintenance Scheduled
item.description:
We ran into issues during the upgrade, and rolled back the changes. We will schedule another attempt in the future once we work through the issues. (13:28 — Jan 26)

K-REx will be unavailable starting at 12PM on 1/26/2023 for system maintenance and software upgrade.

item.title: [Resolved] K-REx Maintenance
item.description:
We ran into issues during the upgrade and reverted back to the previous version. We will schedule another attempt in the future once we work through the issues. (11:26 — Jan 12)

K-REx will be unavailable starting at 9AM on 1/12/2023 for system maintenance and software upgrade.

item.title: [Resolved] Network disruptions will occur in the evening on Jan. 11
item.description:
The network maintenance that was scheduled for tonight has been canceled. IT is working with the vendor to reschedule the maintenance. (14:52 — Jan 11)

The Division of Information Technology will perform network maintenance between 5:30 p.m. and midnight on Wednesday, Jan. 11. During the maintenance, periodic disruptions will occur on the K-State networks, and individuals on campus may have trouble accessing the internet during the maintenance.

Please see https://blogs.k-state.edu/it-news/2023/01/05/network-disruptions-will-occur-in-the-evening-on-jan-10/ for additional information.

item.title: [Resolved] NLA Platform Upgrade (Olive)
item.description:
The upgrade to the Olive release has been completed (10:15 — Jan 10)

We will be upgrading the New Literacies Alliance Open edX instance from Nutmeg to Olive. During this time, the system will be unavailable.

item.title: [Resolved] StaffNet Platform Upgrade
item.description: StaffNet will be unavailable during the scheduled maintenance in order to perform necessary system updates.

item.title: [Resolved] Springshare Server Maintenance
item.description:
We are planning necessary server maintenance for all products starting at 5am Eastern on Thursday, December 29, 2022, which will require as much as 5 minutes of down time for each Springshare app (LibApps, LibGuides, LibAnswers, LibCal, LibStaffer, LibWizard, LibInsight, and LibConnect).

There are no changes required on your side. This is simply a notification of the expected down time while we update our servers.

Thank you, The Springshare Team

item.title: [Resolved] Alma and Primo VE (Search It) Down
item.description:
Ex Libris has reported that their engineers have resolved the disruption with our Alma and Primo VE (Search It) environments. If you are still not able to access Alma or Search It, please refresh your browser. If you still cannot access Alma or Search It after refreshing your browser, please submit a Ticket

Ex Libris Alma Production and Primo VE (Search It) Production are currently encountering an outage. Ex Libris is aware of the issue and are currently investigating the service disruption.

item.title: [Resolved] Springshare Server Maintenance Downtime - LibCal
item.description:
We are planning required server maintenance for LibCal starting at 3am Eastern on Friday, August 5, 2022, which will require as much as 10 minutes of down time.

There are no changes required on your side. This is simply a notification of the expected down time while we make these updates to our servers.

item.title: [Resolved] Scheduled ILLiad Maintenance
item.description:
This has been completed.

System maintenance is scheduled to start at 2022-07-30 01:00 Central Time through 2022-07-30 05:45 Central Time affecting the following services:

OCLC is performing maintenance that might intermittently impact access to various products and services. If you experience problems, please retry your request. While we schedule maintenance on dates and times to minimize service disruption to our members worldwide, we recognize that this work might impact some users. We apologize for any disruption this may cause, and we appreciate your support and patience.

EZproxy (hosted), ILLiad, WorldCat Discovery

There are no enhancements with this event. Check the OCLC System Status Dashboard to determine if this event completes ahead of schedule. All times are displayed in 24-hour format.

item.title: [Resolved] Scheduled ILLiad Maintenance
item.description:
This has been completed.

System maintenance is scheduled to start at 2022-07-24 01:00 Central Time through 2022-07-24 08:15 Central Time affecting the following services:

OCLC is performing maintenance that might intermittently impact access to various products and services. If you experience problems, please retry your request. While we schedule maintenance on dates and times to minimize service disruption to our members worldwide, we recognize that this work might impact some users. We apologize for any disruption this may cause, and we appreciate your support and patience. ILLiad, Tipasa, WorldShare Interlibrary Loan

There are no enhancements with this event. Check the OCLC System Status Dashboard to determine if this event completes ahead of schedule. All times are displayed in 24-hour format.

item.title: [Resolved] NLA Platform Upgrade
item.description:
2022-07-21 at 5:08PM This has been completed.

We will be upgrading the New Literacies Alliance Open edX instance from Lilac to Nutmeg. During this time, the system will be unavailable.

item.title: [Resolved] Outage in data center for phoenix
item.description:
Update 7/25/22 at 9:10PM Access has been restored to Phoenix. Please submit a ticket if you run into any issues.

Updated 7/15/22 at 11:56AM: The cooling in the datacenter has recovered at this time. I am currently running the disk integrity checks as a precaution, and expect this to finish later this afternoon.

Original Message: Phoenix storage will be unavailable as the data center where it is stationed has no cooling due a leak in the main campus chilled water loop near Ward Hall. They do not have an expected repair, and this may linger through the weekend.

This effects individuals that mount the following drives:

  • K: KSULDigitalProject
  • L: digitalmonographs
  • M: metadata
  • N: CADS
  • Q: DigitalProjectUsers (working directories)
  • R: home directories
  • T: halefirearchives
  • U: uasc
  • V: butlerlab

item.title: [Resolved] Network Maintenance - Library Annex and Executive Court
item.description:
This maintenance has been completed.

NTS will be performing network maintenance affecting Library Annex and Executive Court on 6/29/22 between noon and 1pm. Wired and wireless services from the buildings to main campus resources and the internet will be impacted during this time.

item.title: [Resolved] StaffNet Restricted to Campus and VPN
item.description:
Update 6/3/2022 at 2:13PM StaffNet is available again, and can be accessed without utilizing the VPN.

Update 6/3/2022 at 1:16PM StaffNet will be unavailable today 6/3/2022 from 2PM-2:30PM so an Emergency Patch can be applied.

Due to an unpatched critical vulnerability in the software that runs StaffNet, we have restricted access to campus. If you need to access StaffNet from off-campus you will need to utilize the VPN. Once a patched version is released, we will schedule maintenance to apply the fix, and relax the restrictions at that point.

item.title: [Resolved] Website Outage
item.description: The library website will be unavailable for a short period of time today at 5:30 PM Wed Jun 8th so that we can roll back a patch from this morning which affected some auxillary services for staff and the public.

item.title: [Resolved] Scheduled ILLiad Maintenance
item.description:
System maintenance is scheduled to start at 2022-05-07 23:00 Central Time through 2022-05-08 03:05 Central Time affecting the following services:

OCLC is performing maintenance that might intermittently impact access to various products and services. If you experience problems, please retry your request. While we schedule maintenance on dates and times to minimize service disruption to our members worldwide, we recognize that this work might impact some users. We apologize for any disruption this may cause, and we appreciate your support and patience.

ILLiad

There are no enhancements with this event. Check the OCLC System Status Dashboard to determine if this event completes ahead of schedule. All times are displayed in 24-hour format.
